<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby boilerplate by tomon9086
</h1>

*Original: [gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-default](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-default)*


## Getting Started

1.  **Create a Gatsby site.**

    *if you have not installed Gatsby CLI, run `npm i -g gatsby-cli`*

    create a new site, specifying this boilerplate.

    ```sh
    $ gatsby new my-gatsby-project https://github.com/tomon9086/gatsby-boilerplate
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    run the development server:

    ```sh
    $ yarn dev
    ```

    then, open [http://localhost:8000](http://localhost:8000)


## Static Site Generation

```sh
$ yarn build
```
